| <style="background:#F07746;color:#ffffff;align:center;border:0;margin:0;">'''About me'''
|}

Hello there! such'm a Venezuelan !, eager to continue learning a lot of free technologies. I am active part of the Ubuntu-Ve community since 2012-07-10. Member of Ubuntu-Ubuntu Go Team Anzoategui I started using Debian as a form or way to learn more about computer science, other than that I really liked the ideology of Free Software, after meeting'm using Ubuntu since Ubuntu Maverick Meerkat. Today, as the only operating system for personal use.

Hey I participated in many events in my town, I managed to be at the forefront of migration to the laboratory at the university where my career culminare ing informatics Which migrate achieve 40 lab machines UPTJAA "Territorial Polytechnic University José Antonio Anzoátegui" El Tigre Using as basis system ubuntu Mate

In my time using the various flavors of eh collaborated with difucion, training ubuntu, collaborated documented in my personal blog, and collaborating in other bloges in which we write, solutions to the various problems that may occur, eh speaker at several national events dandoc talks Example:
